title: Enhancing video streaming quality for ExoPlayer - Part 1: Quality of User Experience Metrics
description: The online video player landscape is fragmented with a wide variety of players across a mix of popular platforms. In the world of HTML5-video players in browsers, there are a number of open-source solutions (e.g., hls.js, dash.js, Shaka Player), as well as commercial offerings which include Akamai's AMP.
author: Akamai
